author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: Please Consider This Horrific Fail Your Warning to Always Double-Check Who You're Texting
text:
pic.twitter.com/YuiCja8J9L
— tired girl (@killermarecat) February 20, 2017 Boy meets girl. Boy hits girl up. Girl is crine. Boy offers to come over and help her feel better. Girl accepts. Boy thinks he’s “Bout to get BALLS DEEP BRO.” Boy texts girl exactly that. Boy meant to text “bro.”
Girl rescinds her offer. Girl tweets the above.
Internet has viral gold.
@killermarecat pic.twitter.com/WzravkYb8Z
— tired girl (@killermarecat) February 20, 2017 Follow Tess on Twitter .
